RT @DailDawson1: Founder of #OxyContin pleaded guilty and will be pushed into bankruptcy.  I cried with joy because it's a small justice for my nephew who died from an Oxy OD 10 years ago.  We've been praying for this for a long long time.   A great reminder that God works in years and decades.

RT @JeffYoung8: New work from @ARCgov and @WalshCenter shows deaths from diseases of despair and #opioids declining but still far higher in Appalachia than rest of country. https://t.co/LSNB8AmXqB The @OVReSRC wrote about this in "Appalachian Fall" and it holds an important lesson. (1 of 3) https://t.co/ofr9ZxEj2Y
